verses.verse: Come <S%G71><s%> now <S%G3568><s%>, ye rich <S%G4145><s%>, weep <S%G2799><s%> and howl <S%G3649><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> miseries <S%G5004><s%> that are coming upon you <S%G1904><s%>.
Your <S%G5216><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> are corrupted <S%G4595><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> are <S%G1096><s%> moth-eaten <S%G4598><s%>.

Your <S%G5216><s%> gold <S%G5557><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> silver <S%G696><s%> are rusted <S%G2728><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> rust <S%G2447><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> for a testimony <S%G3142><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall eat <S%G5315><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> as fire <S%G4442><s%>. Ye have laid up your treasure <S%G2343><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, the hire <S%G3408><s%> of the laborers <S%G2040><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> mowed <S%G270><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fields <S%G5561><s%>, which is of <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> kept back by fraud <S%G650><s%>, crieth <S%G2896><s%> out <S%G2532><s%>: and the cries <S%G995><s%> of them <S%G3588><s%> that reaped <S%G2325><s%> have entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ears <S%G3775><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of Sabaoth <S%G4519><s%>.

Ye have lived delicately <S%G5171><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> taken your pleasure <S%G5171><s%>; ye have nourished <S%G5142><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts2588, 5613 in <S%G1722><s%> a day <S%G2250><s%> of slaughter <S%G4967><s%>.
Ye have condemned <S%G2613><s%>, ye have killed <S%G5407><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> one <S%G498><s%>; he doth not <S%G3756><s%> resist <S%G498><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.

Be patient <S%G3114><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>. Behold <S%G2400><s%>, the husbandman <S%G1092><s%> waiteth for <S%G1551><s%> the precious <S%G5093><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, being patient <S%G3114><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, until2193, Leviticus2 it receive <S%G2983><s%> the early <S%G4406><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> latter <S%G3797><s%> rain <S%G5205><s%>.

Be <S%G3114><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> patient <S%G3114><s%>; establish <S%G4741><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%>.

Murmur <S%G4727><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, one against <S%G2596><s%> another <S%G240><s%>, that ye be not <S%G3361><s%> judged <S%G4253><s%>: behold <S%G2400><s%>, the judge <S%G4253><s%> standeth <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G3588><s%> the doors <S%G2476><s%>.

Take <S%G2983><s%>, <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, for an example <S%G5262><s%> of suffering <S%G2552><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of patience <S%G3115><s%>, the prophets <S%G4396><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, we call <S%G3106><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> blessed <S%G3106><s%> that endured <S%G5278><s%>: ye have heard <S%G191><s%> of the patience <S%G5281><s%> of Job <S%G2492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> have seen <S%G1492><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, how that <S%G3754><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> full of pity <S%G4184><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> merciful <S%G3629><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> above <S%G4253><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, swear <S%G3660><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, neither <S%G3383><s%> by the heaven <S%G3772><s%>, nor <S%G3383><s%> by the earth <S%G1093><s%>, nor <S%G3383><s%> by any <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G243><s%> oath <S%G3727><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> let <S%G2277><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> yea <S%G3483><s%> be <S%G2277><s%> yea <S%G3483><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> your nay <S%G3756><s%>, nay <S%G3756><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> ye fall <S%G4098><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> under <S%G1519><s%> judgment <S%G3956><s%>.

Is <S%G2553><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> suffering <S%G2553><s%>? Let him pray <S%G4336><s%>. Is <S%G2114><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> cheerful <S%G2114><s%>? Let him sing praise <S%G5567><s%>.

Is <S%G770><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> sick <S%G770><s%>? Let him call <S%G4341><s%> for the elders <S%G4245><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> let them pray <S%G4336><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, anointing <S%G218><s%> him <S%G846><s%> with oil <S%G1637><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> the prayer <S%G2171><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> shall save <S%G4982><s%> him that is sick <S%G2577><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> shall raise <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G1453><s%>; and if <S%G2579><s%> he have <S%G5600><s%> committed <S%G4160><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>, it shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Confess <S%G1843><s%> therefore your sins <S%G3900><s%> one to another <S%G240><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> pray <S%G2172><s%> one <S%G240><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> another <S%G240><s%>, that <S%G3704><s%> ye may be healed <S%G2390><s%>. The <S%G1754><s%> supplication <S%G1162><s%> of a righteous man <S%G1342><s%> availeth <S%G2480><s%> much in its working <S%G4183><s%>.

Elijah <S%G2243><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> of like passions <S%G3663><s%> with <S%G2254><s%> us <S%G2532><s%>, and he prayed <S%G4336><s%> fervently <S%G4335><s%> that it might <S%G1026><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> rain <S%G1026><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it rained <S%G1026><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> for three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G1763><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> months <S%G3376><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he prayed <S%G4336><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> rain <S%G5205><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> brought forth <S%G985><s%> her <S%G846><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%>.

My brethren <S%G80><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> err <S%G4105><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> convert <S%G1994><s%> him <S%G846><s%>;

let him know <S%G1097><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> he who converteth <S%G1994><s%> a sinner <S%G268><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the error <S%G4106><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> shall save <S%G4982><s%> a soul <S%G5590><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall cover <S%G2572><s%> a multitude <S%G4128><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%>.
